projects.title: Bay Area Contractor
projects.description: Construction of decks, fences, garden boxes, utility cabinets, and over 38 other medium-scale projects with my brother Fynn.
projects.skills: Carpentry, Masonry, Construction Design, Client Relations, Marketing & Sales

projects.title: Landscape Designer
projects.description: Was brought on as a landscape designer for System Pavers, a national landscaping company. Over my 8 months I designed and sold over $400,000 of installed construction.
projects.skills: 3D Design Software, Hardscape Design, Client Relations, Sales, Project Management

projects.title: Blaptica Dubia Cockroach Farm
projects.description: Built and operated an incubated breeding system housing approximately 40,000 Blaptica dubia cockroaches, wholesaling to local pet shops as a feed source for reptiles and amphibians.
projects.skills: Animal Husbandry, CPG, Small Business Operations

projects.title: Rodent Anesthesia Masks
projects.description: Designed and manufactured custom anesthesia masks for rodent model research - both stereotaxic and non-stereotaxic deisgns.
projects.skills: SolidWorks CAD, SLA & FDM 3D Printing, B2B Sales & Marketing

projects.title: Vertical Pole Stroke Recovery Test
projects.description: Developed behavioral testing equipment and protocols for assessing neurological deficits in rats post ischemic stroke while working in Dr. Lowâ€™s Stroke and Stem Cell Lab at the University of Minnesota.

projects.title: Operational Strandbeest Sculpture
projects.description: Medium-sized operational kinetic sculpture inspired by Theo Jansen's designs. Constructed from over 500 pieces of cold drawn and flat steel, assembled with over 2,000 welds. Fully rideable and functional.
projects.skills: MIG Welding, Metal Fabrication, Solidworks, Kinetic Design
